trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Pinellas Park
There were no other sightings in Pinellas Park on or around March 13th 2005
divs: sighting detailssighting report: at 9:30 pm on 3\12\2005 my friend, wife and i were out side talking. my wife looked up and saw a light that looked like a star it was moving all over the place real fastand then it took off over the gulf. it is a real clear night and we all saw it. this is realy strang because the night before at about 7:50 the tampa bay area felt and heard loud noise it shook houses for three countys it was even onthe news. thay said it was a sonic boom from 2 f18s landing at mc dill afb. i have lived close to a afb. most of my life and never herd anything like that. it also registered 2.7 on the ricter scale. my friend told me to send this site. i dont now if the military is testing or not. so i thought i would report this to you thanks. bob
